Fixed.title: Theme
Fixed.description: Fixed Storybook theme and emotion compatibility with newest Storybook version (6.5.0-alpha.53).

Changed.title: Folder Structure
Changed.description: Moved several components into other folders according to the MUI component structure.

Added.title: Stories
Added.description: Added stories for almost every component.

Added.title: Happy Token System
Added.description: Added the Happy Token System to enable more customer themes.

Added.title: Theme Switch
Added.description: Added a switch for the new Happy Token System themes.

Added.title: Dynamic Light & Dark Mode
Added.description: Added a switch for light & dark Mode to also work in sync with the new Happy Token System themes.

Added.title: MUI Documentation Button
Added.description: Added a button in the toolbar to access the MUI documentation for the current component that is viewed in Storybook.

Added.title: Sync Components with Figma
Added.description: Sync themeing with prototypes from Figma.

Added.title: Storybook a9s Theme
Added.description: Added the a9s theme for Storybook (not the canvas).

Added.title: Refactoring Decorators
Added.description: Moved Themeprovider and other decorators to separate file, adjusted configs.

Removed.title: Default a9s Theme for ThemeProvider
Removed.description: Removed the default a9s light and dark theme since the newest version of the Design System only works with the Happy-Token-System.
